abstract: The Occupy Wall Street protesters are welcome to stay on indefinitely, as long as they obey the laws, New York City voters of all political stripes said in a Quinnipiac University poll.
snippet: The Occupy Wall Street protesters are welcome to stay on indefinitely, as long as they obey the laws, New York City voters of all political stripes said in a Quinnipiac University poll.

headline.main: Presence of Wall St. Protesters Is Accepted, Poll Finds
